head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HILL, THOMAS D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HILL, THOMAS D.

block.p: HILL-Thomas D. Jr. On November 25, 1998, of Pleasantville, NY. Retired senior Vice President of Chase Manhattan Bank. Husband of Frances. Father of five. Reposing at the Maher Funeral Home, Pleasantville, NY (914-769-2044) Friday 2-4 and 7-9 PM where services will be held at 8 PM that night. Interment, Saturday morning, Gate of Heaven Cemetery.
